item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Eric and currently work at Caterpillar, Inc. building digital products using IIoT data. Previously, I was a graduate teaching assistant at Western Michigan University while completing my Master’s in Statistics. 📍✋ Hastings, MI ➡️ 📍🏡 Peoria, Il In my free time I enjoy playing golf and trying new foods/restaurants!
